name: Items to features
description: Adds new features to a dataset based on the items in one of its fields

inputs.name: items-field
inputs.description: The name or identifier of the items field from which features are extracted

inputs.name: true-value
inputs.description: The value to use in the new columns to indicate that the value is present.

inputs.name: false-value
inputs.description: The value to use in the new columns to indicate that the value is present.

outputs.name: output-dataset
outputs.description: The identifier of the generated dataset
